2023-24.name: Timothy Blanton
2023-24.intro: Hello, I’m Timothy. I am a fourth year mathematics major interested in Combinatorics and Algebra. I am excited to be Math Club’s President for the 2023-2024 school year. Outside of math, I like playing video games, running, and hiking. Please don’t hesitate to reach out to me at trblanton@ucdavis.edu if you have any questions.

2023-24.name: Harry Yang
2023-24.intro: Hello! I am Harry, an Applied Mathematics major and I am excited to be the VP of internal affairs for the 2023-24 school year. Outside of school, I like to mess around with synthesizers, read, and juggle balls. I hope to share the beautiful knowledge of mathematics with you all!

2023-24.name: Mani Ebrahimi Mojaveri
2023-24.intro: A still pure, somewhat applied, math major with broad interests in mathematical biology and neuroscience, I’m excited to be leading the club into an exciting year. I want to promote student involvement in the department, encourage undergraduate research, and provide a community for math enthusiasts (and those that don’t love our field as much, too!) a space to share their thoughts and learn from each other. Definitely say hi to me after the meeting: I’m always happy to meet new people.

2023-24.name: Jinguang Chai
2023-24.intro: Hi, I am Jinguang. I am a fifth-year undergraduate student majoring in mathematics and computer science. I am the treasurer of the Math Club for the 2023-2024 school year. I am interested in anything related to mathematics. In my spare time, I usually travel, watch movies, read books, and collect coins.

2023-24.name: Zachery Whitehead
2023-24.intro: Hi, I’m Zach. I’m a physics and math double major and will be this year’s secretary. In my free time I like to study The Bible, hang out with friends, meet new people, and watch movies. I am very excited to meet everyone and talk with you all about some interesting topics.

2023-24.name: Anjali Jain
2023-24.intro: Hi, I'm Anjali (I also go by Jay). I am a Computer Science and Engineering major. In my free time, I like to play guitar, make random lists, watch sitcoms and murder mysteries, and bug my friends.

2023-24.name: Jada Yip
2023-24.intro: Hi! I’m Jada, a Mathematics and Scientific Computation Major with a minor in Tech Management. I am the Math Club’s Graphic Design Chair and Marketing Chair for the third year in a row! Outside of math, I enjoy creating art, playing around with spreadsheets, and taking long walks. I am looking forward to another great year!

2023-24.name: Sydney Yoshimura
2023-24.intro: Hi, my name is Sydney and I’m a double major in Mathematics and Design at UC Davis. I’m Co-Vice President of the math club and I love skiing, puzzles, reading, and fashion!

2023-24.name: Andrew Patton
2023-24.intro: Hey, I’m Andrew a third year applied mathematics student with interests in biophysics and computational neuroscience. I like biking and playing videogames outside of classes. Looking forward to a strong year for Math Club!

2023-24.name: Jeremie Park
2023-24.intro: Hey, I’m Jeremie, a second year math major and this year’s outreach chair for Math Club! My interests are mostly in algebra, combinatorics and geometry. In my free time, I enjoy reading, yo-yoing, playing video games and hanging out with friends. I hope we can have a great time studying math together this year!

2023-24.name: Warren Miller
2023-24.intro: Hi, I’m Warren, currently a Math and Scientific Computation major. I'm interested in non-Euclidean geometry and topology. Outside of math, I enjoy botany, cooking, and messing with various other hobbies.

2023-24.name: Vincent Hsu
2023-24.intro: Hello, I’m Vincent, another physics/math double major and the general chair for Math Club this year!. In my free time, I like to watch Netflix, play ultimate with my friends, and read books. I am very excited to meet everyone this year!

2023-24.name: Elizabeth Angulo
2023-24.intro: Hello! I’m Liz, a fourth year Applied Mathematics major. I am this year's DEI chair. Outside of school I enjoy watching a ton of TV or playing video games on my switch. I look forward to being a part of the club!

2023-24.name: Diego Martinez
2023-24.intro: Hello! I’m Diego, a third year majoring in Math and Statistics. As our club’s wellness chair and an advocate for mental health awareness, I look forward to engaging our club in different ways of promoting overall well being. Outside of math, I enjoy long distance running and playing guitar!
